title: Story Puzzle
description: Arrange the fragments to form a coherent story

questions.correctAnswer: Die hond het 'n ou skoen in die tuin gevind.
questions.englishTranslation: The dog found an old shoe in the garden.

questions.correctAnswer: Later that day, it chased a butterfly across the yard.
questions.englishTranslation: Later daardie dag het hy 'n skoenlapper oor die erf gejaag.

questions.correctAnswer: In die aand het hy by die kaggel opgekrul en aan die slaap geraak.
questions.englishTranslation: At night, it curled up by the fireplace and fell asleep.
